about_the_game:
Some rescue princesses, others save the whole world. But here, you save the schnitzel!
In "Super Chipflake Ü: Quest for the Uncooked Schnitzel," you have only one task: satisfy your hunger!
Explore a vast, handcrafted world and solve the diverse problems of various characters.

Features
  • Explore a large, seamless world full of secrets and details.
  • Encounter quirky characters and try to help them with their even quirkier problems.
  • Variety? We've got you covered! We designed the world to be compact to avoid boring, endless walking time!
  • Dig for treasures with the shovel, discover new places with the grappling hook, or speed through the world with the running shoes!

name: Super Chipflake Ü: Quest for the Uncooked Schnitzel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-12100, Ryzen 3 5300G
  • Graphics: Radeon GTX 1060, RX580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: You're hungry. For a schnitzel. The problem is: you have to get it!
